text: The 1924 San Jose State Spartans football team represented State Teachers College at San JoseSan Jose State University was known as State Teachers College at San Jose from 1921 to 1934. during the 1924 college football season. San Jose State competed in the California Coast Conference (CCC). The team was led by first-year head coach Ernesto R. Knollin, and they played home games at Spartan Field in San Jose, California. The team finished the season with a record of one win and four losses (1–4, 0–1 CCC). The Spartans were outscored by their opponents 25–87 for the season. ==Schedule== ==Notes== ==References== San Jose State Category:San Jose State Spartans football seasons San Jose State Spartans f
title: 1924 San Jose State Spartans football team
